This topic is to help anyone that is or is planning to start mapping for our gamemode Puzzle. 
You can download an example map here. 

Things you should know:

When a player touches a checkpoint:
 Their health is set to 100.
Their weapons are stripped.
[/list:u:j6t4aap4]

Players cannot harm any other players with weapons or items. If a player triggers an explosion or any other trap, the victim will not take any health loss.

 If anyone has something to add for mapping to puzzle, I will gladly add it to the OP.
